description:
This is the core course in improving and practicing English speaking skills.
Students will be able to increase their ability to speak, listen and communicate effectively in English.

syllabus.zh: Students will develop speaking ability in English, using English listening and speaking activities in class. Students will improve pronunciation, will identify and use language for everyday contexts, and will identify and apply language for topics of immediate interest to students. Students will be expected to use English in all class activities and in preparing reports, presentations, and role plays for use in class.
syllabus.en: Students will develop speaking ability in English, using English listening and speaking activities in class. Students will improve pronunciation, will identify and use language for everyday contexts, and will identify and apply language for topics of immediate interest to students. Students will be expected to use English in all class activities and in preparing reports, presentations, and role plays for use in class.

weeklySchedule: Listening and speaking exercises related to a variety of everyday topics, such as making small talk, describing people, accommodations, and locations, and talking about news items and recent events (and so on).

teachingAndAssessment.objective: To be able to listen to and understand spoken English
To be able to speak English effectively
To be able to pronounce English clearly and intelligibly
To be able to identify and use language for everyday contexts
To be able to identify and use language for topics of immediate interest of students
